Dimensions:
page  11 13/16 x 9 7/16" (30 x 24 cm)

Title: L'AVANGUARDIA INTERNAZIONALE, Volume 2/L'AVANT-GARDE INTERNATIONALE, Volume 2/THE INTERNATIONAL AVANT-GARDE, Volume 2
